cause.description:
Rock 4 A Cause is a Tacoma, Washington based benefit concert for World Vision's Gulu Project in Northern Uganda. One night a year, people come to enjoy music and support the cause. This year's concert will take place Friday, August 10th at 7 PM at First Presbyterian Church Tacoma. The bands are: Innerveil (1-time-only reunion show) Edison's Invention Cavalier Endeverance Forever Eternal
1. Children must stop being forced into war.
2. Rock 4 A Cause is a fun and easy way to make a difference.
cause.mission: raise money and awareness for the children of war in Gulu, Northern Uganda
cause.name: Rock 4 A Cause
